definition: to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous

sentences.english: The bus was traveling from Monterrey, Mexico to Houston.
sentences.chinese: 這輛巴士但是正從墨西哥蒙特雷市駛往美國休斯頓。

sentences.english: This train goes to London and all stations beyond.
sentences.chinese: 這列火車駛往倫敦及以遠的各站。

sentences.english: This ship will bear up to Havana.
We sailed out of the harbour toward the Pacific.
The carriage drove off towards London, where Jane was to join the party for home.
sentences.chinese: 馬車駛往倫敦，簡要在那兒搭伴和他們一起回家。

sentences.english: A wagon loaded with asters heads for the local market.
sentences.chinese: 一輛滿載着紫菀花的馬車駛往當地的市場。

sentences.english: We have not yet decided but it is heading towards this area.
sentences.chinese: 我們仍未作出決定，但這艘船正駛往該區域。

sentences.english: The vessel is sailing from Hongkong to Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 這船從香港開航駛往上海。

sentences.english: There is no available direct steamer for your port this month.
sentences.chinese: 本月沒有駛往貴港的直達輪船。

sentences.english: The current Orient Express runs from Paris to Vienna.
sentences.chinese: 現在的“東方列車”從巴黎駛往維也納。

sentences.english: The vessel is fully loaded with cargo for Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 這艘船滿載貨物駛往上海。

sentences.english: He went on board and the ship sailed for Leghorn .
sentences.chinese: 他上了船後，船便駛往勒格翁去了。

sentences.english: Afterwards , we sailed into North Inlet and I forgot to watch Hands carefully .
sentences.chinese: 然後，我們把船駛往北部水灣，我也忘了注意漢茲。

sentences.english: After leaving Calais, the ship made for Dover.
sentences.chinese: 離開加來後，那艘船便駛往多佛。

sentences.english: The powerboat picked us up and headed to higher ground.
sentences.chinese: 汽艇帶上我們往高地方向駛往。

sentences.english: They are on their way to Trieste, Italy, right now, " said Marina Haluzan, a spokeswoman for the Croatian ministry."
sentences.chinese: 他們正在駛往意大利裏雅斯德港的途中。
